attributes.action: I want to start a new petition to rejoin the EU again.
attributes.additional_details: This country would be a much better place with European laws protecting the individuals and companies of this country concerning trade, working, and civic laws still in place.
attributes.background: I want to ask the people of this country to rejoin the EU again for a better future of this country.

rejection.details:
we currently have the following petition open, which you might like to sign:

Apply to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497
